name: Quantum Helicopters
about: Quantum Helicopters, established in 1993, is a leading helicopter flight training school and maintenance facility. With over 30 years of experience, we offer one-on-one, tailored training programs allowing students to set their own schedules and progress at their pace. We provide training for all ratings from Private to Airline Transport Pilot, including instrument and instructor ratings. Accredited by the Accrediting Commission of Career Schools and Colleges of Technology (ACCSCT), Quantum is one of the busiest and most respected helicopter schools in the US. Our state-of-the-art facility in Chandler, Arizona, includes nearly 8,000 square feet of office space and a 14,400 square foot hangar. We are committed to safety, excellence, and producing well-educated, employable pilots, with a strong track record of placing graduates in the industry. Quantum Helicopters remains steadfastly dedicated to the success of its students.
